name: Keep The Eggs Up!
description:
Submitted for the Ludum Dare 46 Game Jam!

Made in 3 days, the theme of the jam was "Keep it Alive".

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys --- Move

Space Bar -- Interact

Noted problems:

- Player can run off screen.

- Sometimes hitting the space bar even when within the reach of an egg has no effect - all I can say is sorry:) Reload the game and it should work!

Goal:

Keep the eggs from tipping over. If one of the eggs is about to tip, an animation will trigger around that egg; get to it and tap space bar to keep it from falling!

The game will get progressively harder. Good luck!

Solo Dev Project!
